statements: SELECT * FROM KnowledgeBaseContent WHERE content_id = 1;
SELECT title, author FROM KnowledgeBaseContent WHERE category = 'Programming';
SELECT * FROM KnowledgeBaseContent WHERE author IS NOT NULL ORDER BY created_date DESC;
SELECT title, category FROM KnowledgeBaseContent WHERE content_id IN (2, 4, 6);
SELECT author, created_date FROM KnowledgeBaseContent ORDER BY author ASC, created_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM KnowledgeBaseContent WHERE category = 'Tech' ORDER BY created_date DESC
SELECT title, author, created_date FROM KnowledgeBaseContent WHERE author = 'John Doe' ORDER BY created_date ASC
SELECT * FROM KnowledgeBaseContent WHERE category IN ('Tech', 'Science') AND author IS NOT NULL ORDER BY category, created_date DESC
SELECT title, category FROM KnowledgeBaseContent WHERE created_date >= '2022-01-01' AND created_date < '2022-06-30'
SELECT author, COUNT(*) AS total_content FROM KnowledgeBaseContent GROUP BY author HAVING total_content > 1 ORDER BY total_content DESC
SELECT * FROM content_metadata;
SELECT title, author, created_at FROM content_metadata WHERE content_id = 1;
SELECT title, author, created_at FROM content_metadata WHERE author = 'John Doe';
SELECT title, author FROM content_metadata WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT content_id, title, author FROM content_metadata ORDER BY last_modified_at DESC;
SELECT title, author FROM content_metadata WHERE content_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM content_metadata WHERE author = 'John Doe';
SELECT title, author, last_modified_at FROM content_metadata ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT title, tag_name FROM content_metadata JOIN content_tags ON content_metadata.content_id = content_tags.tag_id;
SELECT AVG(content_id) AS avg_content_id FROM content_metadata;
SELECT * FROM content_metadata;
SELECT id, title, author FROM content_metadata;
SELECT title, author, created_at FROM content_metadata ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM tag_metadata WHERE content_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM user_metadata WHERE creation_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM content_metadata ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT title, author FROM content_metadata WHERE author='John Doe';
SELECT title, author, created_at FROM content_metadata WHERE created_at >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT title, author, created_at, updated_at FROM content_metadata WHERE author='Jane Smith' ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT tag_name, description FROM tag_metadata JOIN content_metadata ON tag_metadata.content_id = content_metadata.id WHERE content_metadata.author='John Doe';
SELECT * FROM Content_Metadata;
SELECT content_title, content_body FROM Content_Metadata;
SELECT content_title, author_id, created_at FROM Content_Metadata ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM Content_Authors WHERE author_email LIKE '%example.com';
SELECT content_id, tag_id FROM Content_Relationships WHERE content_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Content_Metadata;
SELECT content_title, author_id, created_at FROM Content_Metadata WHERE content_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Content_Authors WHERE author_id = 5;

SELECT content_id, tag_name FROM Content_Metadata JOIN Content_Relationships ON Content_Metadata.content_id = Content_Relationships.content_id JOIN Content_Tags ON Content_Relationships.tag_id = Content_Tags.tag_id;
SELECT content_title, author_name, author_email FROM Content_Metadata JOIN Content_Authors ON Content_Metadata.author_id = Content_Authors.author_id;
SELECT * FROM metadata_content ORDER BY creation_date DESC;
SELECT content_title, author_name, category FROM metadata_content WHERE category = 'Science';
SELECT content_title, content_comments.commenter_name FROM metadata_content JOIN content_comments ON metadata_content.content_id = content_comments.content_id;
SELECT content_title, SUM(rating_value) AS total_rating FROM metadata_content JOIN content_ratings ON metadata_content.content_id = content_ratings.content_id GROUP BY content_title;
SELECT category, count(*) AS total_count FROM metadata_content GROUP BY category ORDER BY total_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM metadata_content ORDER BY creation_date DESC;
SELECT content_title, author_name, category FROM metadata_content WHERE category = 'Technology';
SELECT content_title, author_name, creation_date FROM metadata_content WHERE author_name IS NOT NULL AND category = 'Science' ORDER BY creation_date DESC;

SELECT content_title, COUNT(comment_id) AS num_comments FROM metadata_content LEFT JOIN content_comments ON metadata_content.content_id = content_comments.content_id GROUP BY content_title ORDER BY num_comments DESC;

SELECT content_title, rating_value FROM metadata_content INNER JOIN content_ratings ON metadata_content.content_id = content_ratings.content_id WHERE rating_value > 3 ORDER BY rating_value DESC, content_title ASC;
